Punk Rock

Boosts the power of sound- based moves and halves the damage taken from them.

Affected Moves

The following moves are affected by this ability.

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Alluring Voice 10 80 100 Causes confusion if the target's stats were raised during the turn.
Banshee Wail 10 90 100 The user lets loose a deafening shriek. This may cause the target to flinch.
Boomburst 10 140 100 The user hits everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.
Bug Buzz 10 90 100 The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. It may lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
Carnivroar 10 90 100 The user bellows to assert dominance. This may cause the target to flinch.
Chatter 20 65 100 The target is hit with sound waves of deafening chatter and may be left confused.
Clanging Scales 5 110 100 The user's scales make a huge noise to hurt opposing Pokémon but lower its Defense stat.
Clangorous Soul 5 — 100 The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.
Confide 20 — — The user tells the target a secret. This lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
Disarming Voice 15 40 — The user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon with a charming cry that never misses.
Echoed Voice 15 40 100 The user hits the target with an echoing voice. Consecutive usage increases its power.
Eerie Spell 5 80 100 The user hits with tremendous psychic power and removes 3 PP from the target's last move.
Grass Whistle 15 — 55 The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.
Growl 40 — 100 The user growls in an endearing way, lowering the Attack stats of opposing Pokémon.
Heal Bell 5 — — The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all allies.
Howl 40 — — The user howls loudly to raise the spirit of itself and allies. This raises their Attack stats.
Hyper Voice 10 90 100 The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.
Metal Sound 40 — 85 A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.
Noble Roar 30 — 100 The user intimidates the target with a noble roar and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
Overdrive 10 80 100 The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar.
Parting Shot 20 — 100 The user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats, then switches with a party Pokémon.
Perish Song 5 — — Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out.
Polar Shriek 15 75 100 The user lets out a chilling shriek. This may leave the target with frostbite.
Psychic Noise 10 75 100 Unplesant sound waves prevent the target from recovering HP for two turns.
Relic Song 10 75 100 The user's ancient song appeals to the opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.
Roar 20 — — The target is scared off and switched. This ends a battle against a single wild Pokémon.
Round 15 60 100 The user sings to the target. Others can join in the Round to increase its power.
Screech 40 — 85 An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.
Sing 15 — 55 A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.
Snarl 15 55 95 The user yells and rants about something, lowering the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.
Snore 15 50 100 This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. It may also make the target flinch.
Sparkling Aria 10 90 100 The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles that cure burns.
Supersonic 20 — 55 The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.
Torch Song 10 80 100 The user spews flames as if singing, scorching the target. This boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
Uproar 10 90 100 The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no one can fall asleep.

Level-Up

The following Pokémon can equip this ability after reaching a certain level.
# Pokémon Type Level
441 Toxtricity
54

Natural Ability

The following Pokémon can have this ability when you find them in the wild.

The following Pokémon can have this ability as their hidden ability.
